headline: ‘It limits you’: Chipotle manager allegedly refused to schedule worker who needed to pump
summary: The PUMP Act granted federal protections to nursing employees, but working parents may not be aware of what the law provides.

raw.headline: ‘It limits you’: Chipotle manager allegedly refused to schedule worker who needed to pump

headline: 2 Growth Stocks That Could Skyrocket in 2025 and Beyond
summary: With the recent market pullback, technology stocks have gotten a lot of investors' attention lately, but they are not the only growth stocks that suddenly find themselves at much lower prices.  Coffee shop operator Dutch Bros (NYSE: BROS) finds itself down around 20% from its highs as of this writing, while the stock of Mediterranean fast-casual restaurant operator Cava Group (NYSE: CAVA) has been nearly cut in half.  Both Dutch Bros and Cava have become very popular with consumers.
